sentences: Keele aegade suhet mõistmine on oluline.
Verbi grammatiline kategooria väljendab tegevuse suhet minevikuga.
context: The word 'suhet' is the partitive form of the Estonian noun 'suhe', which means relationship or connection. In grammatical contexts, it specifically refers to how a verb relates to time (past, present, future). The dictionary shows that in linguistic terminology, it's used when explaining grammatical tenses and their temporal relationships.
